name: part_005
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage1 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [00xeNL3vdQo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow featuring numerous messages and illustrations from fans and hololive members for the 5th fes. 'Capture the Moment'.
An "Attention" segment providing guidelines for visitors, including warnings about flashing lights and rules about cheering and masks.
Showcase of hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment official merchandise and sales periods.
Introduction of hololive products from Bandai and Bandai Spirits displayed at the EXPO venue.

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: 声出し応援 OK です
※マスクの着用はお客様の任意でお願いいたします
subtitles.english: *Mask wearing is at the visitor's discretion.

subtitles.original: hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment オフィシャルグッズ
subtitles.english: hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment Official Goods

subtitles.original: オフィシャルグッズ販売期間
バンダイ、バンダイスピリッツより、
EXPO会場でも展示中の商品をご紹介。
subtitles.english: we're introducing products currently on display at the EXPO venue.
